name: Chaotic Beans
description:
Hello, I am Freshi! A beginner in developing games! I have created a game called "Chaotic Beans". By the title, you can tell that this game has beans and is chaotic!

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

You have fight through waves of enemies on each level, there are 5 levels in total. I will be adding more levels and updates to the game. On Level 5, you have to defeat the boss who is called "Big Bean Boss." He looking kind of THICC. He also has 2 lightsabers that are green and do a lot of damage so be careful!

The enemies include 3 stages.

1. Red Beans

These beans are red with red lightsabers, and do not that much damage. Be careful though, because if you don't dodge their attacks they will do more damage then usual. 

2. Blue Beans.

These beans are blue with a special kind of weapon. The weapon is called "The Bonk Hammer" and is used to BONK the player on the head. I will be adding a bonk animation to this game very soon. They do a decent amount of damage so watch out! That bonk hammer is pretty strong.

3. Green Beans

These beans are green, with nothing but their fist. They wont have a weapon until a future update but there really strong. You know how there is "One Punch Man?" Well these beans can definitely punch almost as strong as him. These are the strongest beans. 

These are all the enemies! I hope you enjoy this game, also there is a decent amount of parkour! Let me know if you want more updates on this game, it could be improved.

Credits

Music/sound effects created by Russet or RussetVibes.
